title: Candy Corn Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Screw pie -- find out if you should bring Candy Corn Oreo Cookies to Thanksgiving.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Check out the Oreo Oration playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&feature=plcp

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody welcome to Oreo Oration I'm Greg Miller and while you're out living your life and getting ready for Thanksgiving, the fine people at Nabisco are making endless variations of Milk's Favorite Cookie. So every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like this video and subscribe to my channel today we're reviewing Candy Corn Oreo Cookies yes ladies and gentlemen you've heard about them on the news they are a Target exclusive nowhere to get them except Target now here's the thing I'm not going to lie to you guys you'll find out an Oreo Oration we tear up in a new package every week, Candy Corn Oreos so hot I had to dip into the personal Greg Miller reserve and pull out cookies I've already eaten so you'll see there's a whole bunch missing I like the package we talked a lot you know first look is the first part of every orientation and we talk about here how good they look right they're in a nice hard

see there's a whole bunch missing i like the package we talked a lot you know first look is the first part of every orientation and we talk about here how good they look right they're in a nice hard packaging a different kind of bag it doesn't use the Nabisco tearaway that we're so used to but this actually keeps them there and then here's a downside i think to the Candy Corn Oreo an overpowering just aroma of basically frosting it smells like you are in a bakery it smells like you were in a bakery where a bunch of frosting has fallen out of cakes and you're like why did you put the frosting in the cakes it goes on the cakes and they just say i don't know but let's move on to the taste test here we'll give you we'll give you a look at what we're getting into you see it's got the yellow it's got the orange and then it's got the shortbread cookie on top we'll bite you out in the middle try to get both yeah and see here's the thing weird about the Candy Corn Oreo is that a lot of people

got the orange and then it's got the shortbread cookie on top we'll bite you out in the middle try to get both yeah and see here's the thing weird about the Candy Corn Oreo is that a lot of people think oh it's going to taste like candy corn it tastes nothing like candy corn it tastes like cake frosting there's no doubt about it that that middle part is just cake frosting but it plays really well with the shortbread white cookie the gold cookie we talk so much about here on Oreo Oration um the Oreo you know the Oreo that's golden it has a sweet flavor to it already it goes well with the frosting flavor i like it i'm a fan of the taste let's see how it goes with milk of course every Oreo should go well with milk it's kind of part of their whole thing right milk's favorite cookie that's what they say one two three i wouldn't do it if i had a choice i wouldn't be dunking these cookies the golden Oreo it doesn't really suck in the milk like we've talked about before the milk that you do

they say one two three I wouldn't do it if I had a choice I wouldn't be dunking these cookies The Golden Oreo doesn't really suck in the milk like we've talked about before the milk that you do get taste-wise doesn't really compliment the frosting because the frosting is overpowering like basically my aunt she loves just walking by cakes and doing that and then eating the frosting These are the cookie for her it's frosting between two cookies The cook I mean the cookie could be cardboard it doesn't matter it's frosting whatever Let's get into tasting or the I'm sorry the twisting a key part of every Oreo bam perfect perfect twist that's not bad Best two out of three though is what we call it on the show bam good you got a little bit of twistage off there but again these are older Oreos I think they've been out there a little bit They're a little bit you know whatever There you go A Double Stuffed Candy Corn Oreo if if you thought like here's the thing ladies and gentlemen at no

I think they've been out there a little bit. They're a little bit... whatever, there you go. A Double Stuffed Candy Corn Oreo. If if you thought like here's the thing, ladies and gentlemen, at no point do you need to make this cookie. There is too much frosting taste in here already. Do not do this because then you will just go straight to diabetes mode, and I will have to come to your house and cut off your leg. But let's talk about the final review score of Candy Corn Oreos. I i talk about it a lot. I'm not a fan of super sweet things, overly sweet things, and these are super sweet. But it kind of works. It also is for me personally a deterrent to eating more. I eat one, I eat two, I'm done. I don't need any more Candy Corn Oreos, which is not a bad thing. Real Oreos, I'll say you give me some Very Berry Oreos, I'll sit right now and kill that package in front of you, no regrets. Candy Corn Oreo is going to cut it short. Taste okay, good, good. First look in the packaging don't pair well with milk twisting.

Candy Corn Oreo is going to cut it shirt taste okay good good first look in the packaging don't pair well with milk twisting don't do it but it works I would say eight again they're eight they're they're they're they're good for what you want like you want an Oreo for every occasion this is the one you bring to the holiday party and say you don't need that piece of pie grandma I got this cookie that's just like a little bit of cake and you can have that and be done and grandma's gonna go really yeah you're smarter than you look thanks wait what that's how it works ladies and gentlemen that's the way the cookie crumbles for Candy Corn Oreo's uh but what do you think these have been out they're Target exclusive like I said only available at Target if you've had them let me know what you think make a video review leave it as a video response below then like the video subscribe to my channel and here's the big thing

said only available at Target if you've had them let me know what you think make a video review leave it as a video response below then like the video subscribe to my channel and here's the big thing are there Oreos out there that I haven't reviewed that you haven't heard me talk about if so leave them in the comments below along with where I can get them then share the video with your friends so they'll comment about other Oreos they've seen I can get to I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday with a new review until I run out of cookies but until then keep on dunking hmm
